member.name: T:Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.UberProfIntegration.LinqToSqlAppender
member.summary: Implements a strong-typed wrapper for Linq to Sql Profiler. (Tested for build 661)
member.remarks: The wrapper uses runtime-binding to redirect the calls to Linq to Sql Profiler's API. This removes the static dependcy on Linq to Sql Profiler.
